#summary A snappy tutorial
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Installation =

[http://code.google.com/p/horns/downloads/list Download] an installer.

_Note: the Linux versions require libreadline6._

= Usage =

Interpreter:

{{{
% horns
}}}

Script mode:

{{{
% horns script.lsp
}}}

= Example =

{{{
% horns
Horns v0.0.4 (c) 2010 Andrew Pennebaker www.yellosoft.us
Press Control-C to exit.
> (print "Hello World")
Hello World
}}}
